Das Tochterunternehmen Publica richtet sich an Geschäftskunden im Bereich Corporate Communications. 

Die Tagesspiegel-Gruppe gehört – wie die Zeit Verlagsgruppe und die Handelsblatt Mediagroup – zur DvH Medien GmbH von Dieter von Holtzbrinck. 

Karrieremöglichkeiten:

Auf Konzerten, im Club oder über Streaminganbieter.  

Musik hat ihren Wert! Davon sind wir bei der GEMA überzeugt.

Wer ein Lied komponiert, Musiktexte schreibt oder Werke verlegt, hat einen Anspruch auf eine faire Vergütung. Wann und wo immer diese Werke öffentlich aufgeführt, im Hörfunk oder Fernsehen kommerziell gesendet, auf einem Medium festgehalten, über digitale Plattformen gestreamt oder anderweitig verbreitet, vervielfältigt oder genutzt werden, ist es nur gerecht, ihre Urheber/-innen an den Einnahmen zu beteiligen.

Die GEMA ist ein wirtschaftlicher Verein, der die Interessen von über 95.000 Mitgliedern vertritt. Dazu zählen Komponist/-innen, Textdichter/-innen und Musikverleger/-innen. Als eine der größten Autorengesellschaften für Werke der Musik weltweit nehmen wir die Rechte dieser Musikschaffenden in Deutschland und die Rechte von über zwei Millionen Rechteinhabern aus aller Welt wahr. 

Wir setzen uns dafür ein, dass diese Musikurheber/-innen an den Einnahmen aus der Aufführung ihrer Werke angemessen beteiligt werden und sie sich ganz auf ihr kreatives Schaffen konzentrieren können. 

Wir schließen die Verträge mit den Musiknutzern ab und nehmen die Vergütung ein. Dieses Geld verteilen wir dann als Tantiemen an unsere Mitglieder. Damit fördern und ermöglichen wir eine lebendige Musikkultur in Deutschland und darüber hinaus. 

Denn: „Musik ist uns was wert“

- Present","company_id":"71493942","endDate":"Present","companyInformation":{"employee_count":34,"activities":["Transport as a Service","Transport on Demand","Software","Freight Tech","Direkttransport","Spedition"],"name":"Cito Transport Technologies GmbH","description":"Cito is the digital transport solution for courier services, time-critical deliveries and the direct transport of goods. We are an innovative fast paced start up of the Volkswagen Group. 

Our service creates an optimal user experience, increases efficiency and offers a first-class price-performance ratio with maximum fairness towards customers and partners. Cito’s mission is to transform the time-critical logistic market and establish simplicity, fairness, and transparency in the market: 

Simplicity
We eliminate inefficiencies through our exceptional digital service, for our customers and logistic partners. From booking to billing, we leverage the potential of digitization so that customer, logistic partners and the transport itself are the focus.
Our solution seamlessly integrates with customers’ and logistic partners’ systems, ensuring a simply and efficient user experience.

Fairness 
We establish fairness by offering our service to logistic partners free of charge. We provide a direct channel between customers and logistic companies. To ensure fairness, we pass value directly to the logistic partners without costly middlemen.

Transparency 
We create industry leading transparency in the supply chain. Customers immediately know transport costs and logistic partners immediately know what they receive for their service. The customer knows which driver picks up the package, can contact him directly, live-track the delivery and receives immediate digital pick-up and delivery confirmation.

We are a young and highly motivated Berlin based team, with the courage and ideas to change the time-critical logistic market through digital technology.

We are an innovative fast paced start up of the Volkswagen Group. 

Our service creates an optimal user experience, increases efficiency and offers a first-class price-performance ratio with maximum fairness towards customers and partners. Cito’s mission is to transform the time-critical logistic market and establish simplicity, fairness, and transparency in the market: 

Simplicity
We eliminate inefficiencies through our exceptional digital service, for our customers and logistic partners. From booking to billing, we leverage the potential of digitization so that customer, logistic partners and the transport itself are the focus.
Our solution seamlessly integrates with customers’ and logistic partners’ systems, ensuring a simply and efficient user experience.

Fairness 
We establish fairness by offering our service to logistic partners free of charge. We provide a direct channel between customers and logistic companies. To ensure fairness, we pass value directly to the logistic partners without costly middlemen.

Transparency 
We create industry leading transparency in the supply chain. Customers immediately know transport costs and logistic partners immediately know what they receive for their service. The customer knows which driver picks up the package, can contact him directly, live-track the delivery and receives immediate digital pick-up and delivery confirmation.

We are a young and highly motivated Berlin based team, with the courage and ideas to change the time-critical logistic market through digital technology.

With us, companies and private consumers join forces with the common goal of reducing their energy costs. We bundle the energy needs of our members and buy at the most favorable trading places. This guarantees conditions of the large-scale industry and secures real market prices. With us, there are no complicated tariffs and no risk surcharges for long price commitments. Our members benefit from fairness and transparency.
At the same time, sustainable and environmentally conscious actions are close to our hearts. That is why we are 100% climate-neutral and actively committed to climate protection. Our members can also participate in this commitment - with our certified green electricity or green gas. 
Our philosophy is that energy must remain resource-friendly and affordable.

Over several decades, Galerie Max Hetzler has expanded, having worked with nearly 175 artists and representing a strong core of leading international artists and supporting the legacy of several estates. The state-of-the-art wedding planning toolkit allows couples to plan their whole wedding from any device, anytime, anywhere, together, all in one place. Whether it is shortlisting florists, juggling your guestlist, handling RSVPs, managing quotes and balancing your budget, Bridebook is your trusty wedding planning sidekick and the long awaited update to the industry. Welcome to the world wide wed.

Bridebook also has leading experts on hand, from beauty guru Bobbi Brown, to advise on your wedding look, to Britain's favourite baker, Mary Berry, who has your wedding cake questions dusted. The UK's top wedding providers also impart their wisdom - think George Clooney's wedding stationer, Kate Moss’s wedding florist, Kate Middleton’s wedding hair stylist.

The wedding 'dashboard'​ gives real-time updates and guidance on the planning progress and what to tackle next, who should pay for what, and how to delegate to the unsuspecting bridal party. The Bridebook budget guide is an industry first, based on the budget analysis of thousands of previous weddings, guiding couples as to how to make the most of their budget. Herzstück unserer Technologie unser Energy Trader mit Künstlicher Intelligenz. Er verbindet Stromspeicher, Ladesäulen und Wärmepumpen mit der Strombörse. Der Energy Trader von Enpal lädt den Speicher und das E-Auto auf, wenn die Preise an der Strombörse besonders niedrig sind. Er verkauft den Strom gewinnbringend ins Stromnetz, wenn die Preise besonders hoch sind. So profitieren die Haushalte doppelt. 

Enpal ist damit führend in der Technologie für virtuelle Kraftwerke und auf dem Weg zum größten virtuellen Kraftwerk in Europa, das schon bald die Leistung eines Atomkraftwerks haben soll.

Enpal ist mehrfacher Testsieger für Solaranlagen und Wärmepumpen. Mit über 80.000 Kundinnen & Kunden in Deutschland und Italien machen wir Energie, wie sie sein soll: einfach, günstig, sauber, und intelligent vernetzt.

A company with tradition that has set new standards again and again during a history that goes back to the year 1871. Sedus is leading in ergonomics, manufacturing processes and ecology. As a global player with eight subsidiaries in Europe the group continually redefines the concept of aesthetic office furniture and gives a new and timeless quality to the office environment. 
From the reception area to individual, combi, open-plan and directors’ offices, Sedus offers furniture solutions and space planning for the entire organisation. Guided by the rules of modern workstation design and tailored to meet the customer’s needs.
Countercyclical investments, consistent expansion of our product portfolio and sales expertise are the strategic building blocks that successfully differentiate Sedus from its competitors and give the company strong brand positioning.

Milestones
2012 Sedus wins Environmental Award for Businesses in Baden-Württemberg
2010 EMAS III certification for Sedus
2008 Gesika Büromöbelwerk GmbH becomes Sedus Systems GmbH, Geseke
2005 Concept: “Place 2.5 - the new emotional office culture“
2002 Merger with Gesika Büromöbelwerk GmbH
2000 Development of the first swivel chair with an opening angle greater than 40 degrees
1999 Majority share in the office furniture manufacturer, Klöber GmbH in Überlingen, Germany
1995 Conversion to Sedus Stoll Aktiengesellschaft (public limited company).
First German furniture manufacturer to participate in the EU "eco audit"​ scheme (EMAS)
1985 Establishment of the Stoll VITA Foundation
1973 Development of the anatomic chair, the permanent contact backrest and the "Similar"​ mechanism  
1971 Establishment of the company’s own research and development department with the largest and most modern test laboratory in the industry.
1929 The first swivel chair on castors

Flustix - rethinking plastics 

Flustix as a sustainability label and certification body tests products and packaging for their use and volume of plastics. Plastic-free, plastic-reduced products as well as products made from recycled plastics can be labelled with one of our symbols. We thereby provide a reliable guide for eco-conscious customers and facilitate CSR for brands. The Flustix certification mark is the world’s first symbol for plastic purity, registered as a European Union Certification Mark by the European Union Intellectual Property Office (EUIPO) and the German Patent and Trade Mark Office. With this registration, Flustix can be considered both a certification mark as well as a legally protected word and figurative trademark.

Plastic pollution has reached vast proportions. By now, plastic residue and tiny plastic particles can be detected in food, water and the ground. The consequences for the environment are fatal – animals and plants are dying and our health is suffering. There is no doubt that we have to cut the use of plastic and rethink synthetic materials in general. At Flustix, we believe that avoiding plastics has to become a focus of corporate CSR-strategies.
Our vision is a world in which we protect nature effectively and use resources responsibly. Flustix is dedicated to plastic reduction and the avoidance of plastic waste. We support the responsible use of fossil fuels and work in close collaboration with environmental organisations and actively support regulations within plastic production. We support environmental organisations, research and educational advertising. ","industry":["Environmental Services"]},"description":"Als Sales Manager bei der flustix GmbH bin ich verantwortlich für die Entwicklung und Umsetzung von strategischen Vertriebsinitiativen, um das Wachstum des Unternehmens voranzutreiben. Meine Aufgabenbereiche umfassen:

1. Neukundengewinnung
Identifizierung potenzieller Kunden und Branchen, die mit den flustix Siegeln am besten harmonieren.
Aufbau eines starken Netzwerks, um Geschäftsmöglichkeiten zu generieren und Leads zu verfolgen.
Präsentation unserer Produkte und Dienstleistungen, um neue Kunden zu gewinnen.

2. Projektmanagement
Leitung und Koordination von Projekten zur Implementierung unserer Lösungen bei Kunden.
Überwachung des Projektfortschritts und Risikomanagement.

3. Key-Account-Management
Pflege und Ausbau von langfristigen Beziehungen zu wichtigen Kunden.
Analyse der Bedürfnisse der Key Accounts und Entwicklung maßgeschneiderter Lösungen.
Sicherstellung der Kundenzufriedenheit und Identifizierung von Upselling-Chancen.","company":"flustix","location":"","position":"Sales Manager","startDate":"01/06/2022","status":""},{"duration":"01/04/2022 - 01/05/2022","company_id":"18220135","endDate":"01/05/2022","companyInformation":{"employee_count":5,"activities":["sustainability","certificate","csr","consumer protection","plastic pollution","environmental activist","packaging","certification mark","sustainability label","alternative packaging","palstic alternatives","green economy","sustainable economy","independent certificate","verbraucherschutz","Produktsiegel","Nachhaltigkeit","Plastikverschmutzung","Verpackungen","Plastikalternativen","Umweltschutz","Produktzertifizierung","Produkttest","Produktprüfung"],"name":"flustix - Rethink Plastics","description":"flustix is a product certification mark for consumer protection, the environment and the economy
Flustix - rethinking plastics 

Flustix as a sustainability label and certification body tests products and packaging for their use and volume of plastics. Plastic-free, plastic-reduced products as well as products made from recycled plastics can be labelled with one of our symbols. We thereby provide a reliable guide for eco-conscious customers and facilitate CSR for brands. The Flustix certification mark is the world’s first symbol for plastic purity, registered as a European Union Certification Mark by the European Union Intellectual Property Office (EUIPO) and the German Patent and Trade Mark Office. With this registration, Flustix can be considered both a certification mark as well as a legally protected word and figurative trademark.

Plastic pollution has reached vast proportions. By now, plastic residue and tiny plastic particles can be detected in food, water and the ground. The consequences for the environment are fatal – animals and plants are dying and our health is suffering. There is no doubt that we have to cut the use of plastic and rethink synthetic materials in general. At Flustix, we believe that avoiding plastics has to become a focus of corporate CSR-strategies.
Our vision is a world in which we protect nature effectively and use resources responsibly. Flustix is dedicated to plastic reduction and the avoidance of plastic waste. Flustix - rethinking plastics 

Flustix as a sustainability label and certification body tests products and packaging for their use and volume of plastics. Plastic-free, plastic-reduced products as well as products made from recycled plastics can be labelled with one of our symbols. We thereby provide a reliable guide for eco-conscious customers and facilitate CSR for brands. The Flustix certification mark is the world’s first symbol for plastic purity, registered as a European Union Certification Mark by the European Union Intellectual Property Office (EUIPO) and the German Patent and Trade Mark Office. With this registration, Flustix can be considered both a certification mark as well as a legally protected word and figurative trademark.

Plastic pollution has reached vast proportions. By now, plastic residue and tiny plastic particles can be detected in food, water and the ground. The consequences for the environment are fatal – animals and plants are dying and our health is suffering. There is no doubt that we have to cut the use of plastic and rethink synthetic materials in general. At Flustix, we believe that avoiding plastics has to become a focus of corporate CSR-strategies.
Our vision is a world in which we protect nature effectively and use resources responsibly. Flustix is dedicated to plastic reduction and the avoidance of plastic waste. We support the responsible use of fossil fuels and work in close collaboration with environmental organisations and actively support regulations within plastic production. We support environmental organisations, research and educational advertising. ","industry":["Environmental Services"]},"start":"6/1/2022","description":"Als Sales Manager bei der flustix GmbH bin ich verantwortlich für die Entwicklung und Umsetzung von strategischen Vertriebsinitiativen, um das Wachstum des Unternehmens voranzutreiben. Präsentation unserer Produkte und Dienstleistungen, um neue Kunden zu gewinnen.

2. Projektmanagement

3. Key-Account-Management
Pflege und Ausbau von langfristigen Beziehungen zu wichtigen Kunden.
Analyse der Bedürfnisse der Key Accounts und Entwicklung maßgeschneiderter Lösungen.

Providing comprehensive talent placement for long-term partnerships: Empion is your specialist for high-quality placements in branches such as marketing, sales, finance, banking, IT, HR, consulting, and various other industries. We apply our expertise to connect businesses with the right professionals. 

What sets us apart: 

Empion is the first automated headhunting system for the skilled labor market. Applicants and companies are matched through a AI-based Robo Advisor based on skills, values, and personality traits. 

In a research-based employer analysis, the Robo Advisor quantifies corporate values and seeks potential candidates accordingly. Talents discover their ideal corporate culture type through Empion. After evaluating the analysis, Empion presents them with suitable job offers. 

Our vision: 

We aim to bring individuality to recruiting, providing both companies and applicants with a personalized experience in talent and job searches. We don't see ourselves merely as traditional recruiters but as dedicated strategic talent consultants. 

Our approach is characterized by personal attention, tailored actions, and a commitment to our talents that goes beyond the ordinary.

🌐 HR-Digitalisierung: Von der Strategie bis zur Umsetzung.

Lasst uns gemeinsam daran arbeiten, eure Personalentwicklung digitaler, effizienter und zukunftsfähig zu gestalten.

Ich freue mich auf den Austausch mit euch!

Ihr möchtet die Wirkung eurer Personalentwicklungsmaßnahmen auf ein neues Level heben? Ich bin euer Ansprechpartner, wenn es darum geht, HR-Digitalisierung erfolgreich umzusetzen und eine nachhaltige digitale Lernkultur zu etablieren. Mit Masterplan biete ich individuelle Lösungen, die genau auf eure Bedürfnisse abgestimmt sind.

Was erwartet euch bei mir?
🌐 HR-Digitalisierung: Von der Strategie bis zur Umsetzung.
🗺️ Strategische Beratung: Orientierung und klare Fahrpläne für eure PE-Strategie.
🖥️ Content-Kuration: Passgenaue Inhalte für euer LMS.
🎉 Engagement-Strategien: Aktivierung und Begeisterung eurer Mitarbeiter im LMS & LXP.
🙌 Benutzerfreundlichkeit: Sicherstellen, dass euer LMS für alle einfach und intuitiv nutzbar ist.

• 🎉 Höheres Engagement und Zufriedenheit durch einfache Bedienung und relevante Inhalte.

Lasst uns gemeinsam daran arbeiten, eure Personalentwicklung digitaler, effizienter und zukunftsfähig zu gestalten.

Ich freue mich auf den Austausch mit euch!

klarx is committed to sustainability. CO2 emissions are very high in the construction sector. We want to reduce emissions and support the energy transition in Germany. After we had selected the Top 8, the WMC was cancelled due to Covid-19, which left us with the task at hand to find a new venue and to reassess and reorganize the entire program.

In meiner bisherigen Laufbahn im Vertrieb habe ich umfassende Erfahrung in der Betreuung von B2B-Kunden, der Akquise neuer Geschäftspartner und der erfolgreichen Implementierung von Wachstumsstrategien gesammelt. Ich habe in verschiedenen SaaS-Branchen gearbeitet, darunter die Food-Tech und Verpackungsindustrie , wo ich maßgeschneiderte Lösungen für Unternehmen entwickelt und implementiert habe.

Kenntnisse: Ich bringe fundierte Kenntnisse im Bereich Sales Development und Account Management mit. Dabei habe ich mich auf den Aufbau langfristiger Kundenbeziehungen und die Optimierung von Lieferketten spezialisiert, indem ich innovative und kosteneffiziente Lösungen angeboten habe. Meine Erfahrung im Bereich Verpackung (Packmatic GmbH) und die Expansion von Lieferdiensten (Uber Eats) haben mir ein tiefes Verständnis für Marktdynamiken, der Optimierung von Geschäftsprozessen sowie der Bedeutung nachhaltiger Lösungen vermittelt.

Erfolgreiche Projekte:

Uber -> 
Bei meinem vorherigen Arbeitgeber habe ich erfolgreich ein Projekt zur Akquise neuer Großkunden durchgeführt, was zu einer deutlichen Umsatzsteigerung im ersten Jahr führte.
In meiner Zeit im Lieferdienstbereich habe ich neue regionale & nationale Partnerschaften aufgebaut und dadurch das Marktvolumen von multiplen Städten enorm gesteigert.

Packmatic ->
Bei meinen derzeitigen und bereits abgeschlossenen Projekten habe ich den Wechsel zu nachhaltigen Verpackungslösungen für mehrere mittelständische Kunden initiiert, welche zu erheblichen Kostenersparnissen uns einer Verbesserung des ökologischen Fußabdrucks des Unternehmens führte.","connections_count":360,"languages":[],"last_name":"Zermoun","network_distance":"SECOND_DEGREE","certifications":[],"firstName":"Yanis ","profilePicture":"https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQErsxYPXvnrSw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_200_200/B4DZUpNOygG4Ac-/0/1740153089588?e=1750896000&v=beta&t=y2JZ52iDwOapFw8IGy9p_mp7Bm7hoJkuz9uuNWHwqqU","provider_id":"ACoAAELMXcgB7xxGlDGMbtHlRSOJ9C4FJs5mE2o","location":"Berlin, Berlin, Germany","shared_connections_count":2}

We are convinced that every office can become smart with just a few steps! Whether with or without sensors, we offer solutions for everyone who wants to make more out of their office. 

Our origin story:

ZIEGERT berät holistisch: Beim Kauf eines hochwertigen neuen Zuhauses für Eigennutzer oder dem Erwerb einer wertbeständigen Anlageimmobilie – auf Wunsch auch inklusive Finanzierung. Die Berater:innen von ZIEGERT Bank- und Finanzierungsconsulting stehen Ihnen mit umfassendem Service, den bestmöglichen Darlehenskonditionen und einem Netzwerk von mehr als 300 Banken im Direktvergleich zur Seite: transparent, unabhängig und vielfältig.  

ZIEGERT bietet mehr: Zudem können Bauträger, Projektentwickler und Investoren von unserem langjährigen, repräsentativen Erfolgsbilanz im B2B-Bereich profitieren – für Wohn- als auch Gewerbeimmobilien. ZIEGERT bietet Ihnen dabei sämtliche Exit-Varianten von ETW-Vertrieb über Globalverkauf bis hin zu Hybrid-Lösungen.  

ZIEGERT ist digital: Unsere Listing-Plattform für Wohnimmobilien EverEstate und die Transaktionsplattform für Globalverkäufe MetaTrust steuern als etablierte Digitalprodukte des ZIEGERT Leistungsportfolios passgenaue Zielgruppenansprachen.

Henkel, headquartered in Düsseldorf / Germany, counts among the most internationally aligned German-based companies in the global marketplace.

Our company purpose expresses what unites us all at Henkel: Pioneers at heart for the good of generations. Our shared values and Leadership Commitments guide our decisions and actions every day.

Present","endDate":"Present","companyInformation":{"employee_count":12159,"profile_url":"https://www.linkedin.com/company/under-armour/","activities":["Performance","Brand","Innovation","Apparel","Footwear","Digital Fitness","Technology"],"description":"Under Armour is obsessed with being better, stronger, and more focused than anyone else out there.  

Our mission: to make athletes better. 

Our vision: to inspire you with performance solutions you never knew you needed and can’t imagine living without. 

Our values define and unite us, the beliefs that are the red thread that connect everyone at Under Armour. Our values are rallying cries, reminding us why we’re here, and fueling everything we do. 

LOVE ATHLETES 

We believe in waking up every morning to make athletes legendary. From the best of the best to the ones just getting started, we put the athlete at the center of everything we do. We create fearlessly with the courage and conviction to defy convention. We innovate by taking bold and smart risks. We show up big where athletes train, compete, and recover. 

CELEBRATE THE WINS 

We believe our victories, big and small, bring us together as a team. We celebrate our accomplishments, giving credit where it's due. We take time to have fun. We channel past successes to inspire our next win. 

STAND FOR EQUALITY 

We believe sport is the great unifier. We don't sit on the sidelines; we speak up for fairness and equity. We treat each other with respect. We apply different perspectives in our work. We come together as a force for good to serve the communities we represent. 

ACT SUSTAINABLY 

We believe our work is not just what we do but how we do it. We work ethically and efficiently to perfect performance while reusing the Earth's resources. We seek new information to develop lasting solutions. We protect our planet for all who now play, and all who will play, on our home field. 

FIGHT ON TOGETHER 

We believe strength is built through tackling adversity. We act with an enterprise mindset in the best interest of the Brand. We help each other overcome obstacles. We act with integrity, have honest conversations and grow over mistakes. We approach challenges with positive intent and never quit.

🌐 𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗠𝗜𝗦𝗦𝗜𝗢𝗡
Teldat develops communication solutions that place us at the forefront of technological developments. 

Revolutionizing 𝗻𝗲𝘁𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴, 𝗜𝗼𝗧 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗰𝘆𝗯𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆 landscapes, we are empowering businesses with visionary solutions that defy new limits.

📈 𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗛𝗜𝗦𝗧𝗢𝗥𝗬
Among corporate communication European Leaders, Teldat has an added value and ability to work closely with clients in adapting solutions and products to their specific project needs.

Teldat enterprise solutions are focus on cloud access, remote office communications, cybersecurity and data connectivity both in office and specific environments (industrial, railway, vehicles, or public services).

With a strong avant-garde vocation, Teldat invests heavily in research, development, and innovation, using highly sophisticated technologies such as network virtualization, artificial intelligence, Federated Learning, 5G and DLT in its solutions’ design and development 

Teldat is now present in all five continents with a wide network of partners, distributors and clients.

🏅 𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗩𝗔𝗟𝗨𝗘𝗦

◽ 𝗘𝘅𝗰𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲: delivering high-quality products, services & support to enable our clients’ success.
Collaboration: to bring brilliant minds and diverse expertise to deliver exceptional solutions 

◽ 𝗔𝗴𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆: a core value, adapting to dynamic landscapes and customer needs, enabling rapid deployment and adaptability. 

◽ 𝗖𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗲𝗿-𝗖𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗰𝗶𝘁𝘆: listening to clients’ needs, challenges, and delivering tailored experiences with added value.  

◽ 𝗘𝗺𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁: of our employees, fostering a culture of growth, continuous learning, and autonomy, to reach their full potential.

Our case studies include:

- Carbon transparency within 20 days

- Calculation of Supplier Carbon Footprint 94% faster
- Savings of thousands of euros  for customers rather than expensive consultants
- Analysis of over 2,260 Supplier Carbon Footprints
- Identification of the top 36 suppliers responsible for 80% of emissions

Fondée à Montréal, au Canada, en 2005, Lightspeed est doublement cotée à la Bourse de New York et à la Bourse de Toronto (NYSE : LSPD) (TSX : LSPD). Avec des équipes réparties en Amérique du Nord, en Europe et en Asie-Pacifique, l'entreprise est au service des entreprises de vente au détail, d'hôtellerie et de golf dans plus de 100 pays.

Mit seinen "Cloud-first"-Datenplattformen unterstützen die Experten Unternehmen in aller Welt bei der Lösung ihrer Herausforderungen in den Bereichen Skalierbarkeit, Interoperabilität und Geschwindigkeit. Außerdem entwickelt und unterstützt InterSystems das Datenmanagement von Krankenhäusern mit einer einheitlichen Lösung aus elektronischer Patientenakte und Patientenmanagementsystem sowie einer umfassenden Patientenakte für Gesundheitssysteme und Staaten. Diese basieren auf einem leistungsstarken Paket aus InterSystems Lösungen für die Integration von Gesundheitsdaten. InterSystems schreibt Exzellenz groß und bietet seinen Kunden und Partnern in mehr als 80 Ländern preisgekrönten Rund-um-die-Uhr-Support. Das 1978 gegründete Unternehmen mit Hauptsitz in Cambridge, Massachusetts (USA), ist mit 25 Niederlassungen rund um den Globus vertreten. Weitere Informationen erhalten Sie unter https://www.intersystems.com/de/

Unsere Produkte: 
•InterSystems IRIS Data Platform, eine einheitliche Komplettlösung, Interoperabilität und Transaktionsverarbeitung bis hin zur Analytik
•InterSystems IRIS for Health, die erste Datenplattform, die speziell für das Gesundheitswesen entwickelt wurde
•InterSystems HealthShare, vernetzte Lösungen im Gesundheitswesen
•InterSystems TrakCare, webbasiertes Gesundheitsinformationssystem

And Serviced Apartments. And there’s the STAYERY. The very, very extraordinary Serviced Apartment. That’s us! Because frankly, we do everything unlike usual! 

THATS US
We transfer the Serviced Apartment into a new generation! And that's a very, very. STAYERY combines the comfort of an apartment with the service of a hotel. With us you can do everything you do at home and even more: STAYERY means to be part of the city. To know where the best drinks are. Real neighbours instead of just next door, stylishly designed apartments and many extras. Short but sweet: who visits us, stays longer.

OUR STORY
We are the start-up amongst the Serviced Apartments. Our first STAYERY opened 2019 in Berlin Friedrichshain, followed by Bielefeld later that year. Our objective is a longstay concept, which for a change is not boring and anonymous. Apartments with a focus on design and functionality. All larger than a hotel room, of course. With a cosy bed niche, pantry kitchen, rain shower and our unique living chaise. Oh yes. Of course there would also be our Loft, something like a Lobby only in cool. It offers everything business travellers and globetrotters could wish for.

But that's not it yet. Our STAYERY family will grow as we will open in Frankfurt, Cologne, Dresden and many more. Because only one STAYERY is not enough for us. We think very, very big!

WORKING AT STAYERY
We loosen up the dusty hotel business and leave shirt and tie in the closet. For that we offer t-shirts and sneakers. We communicate digitally. Start-up atmosphere! And that's exactly why the founders Robert and Hannibal are never far away. Remember: Our business is people first. And that also means employees first! And who are we looking for? Motivated people that share our dream and vision. Sounds like a plan? Get in touch with us!","industry":["Hospitality"]},"description":"","company":"STAYERY.","location":"","position":"Senior B2B Sales Manager","startDate":"01/07/2023"},{"duration":"01/01/2021 - Present","endDate":"Present","companyInformation":{"employee_count":6,"activities":[],"name":"clime","description":"ENABLING CORPORATE CLIMATE TRANSFORMATIONS

The work we do is not only transforming the world of business--it's helping defend governments, and advance scientific and medical research. With a workforce of 2,200 people at its headquarters in Frankfurt am Main and in 28 subsidiaries, it organises events around the world. As in the previous year, annual sales for 2021 were significantly lower owing to the COVID-19 pandemic: approximately €154 million compared with Group sales as high as €736 million in pre-pandemic 2019. We serve our customers’ business interests efficiently within the framework of our Fairs & Events, Locations and Services business fields. Sustainable business practices are a central pillar in our corporate strategy and strike a healthy balance between ecological and economic interests, social responsibility and diversity. Another of Messe Frankfurt’s strengths is its powerful and closely knit global sales network, which covers around 180 countries in all regions of the world. Our comprehensive range of services – both onsite and online – ensures that customers worldwide enjoy consistently high quality and flexibility when planning, organising and running their events. We are using our digital expertise to develop new business models. The wide range of services includes renting exhibition grounds, trade fair construction and marketing, personnel and food services. 
With its headquarters in Frankfurt am Main, the company is owned by the City of Frankfurt (60 percent) and the State of Hesse (40 percent). 
For more information, please visit our website at: www.messefrankfurt.com

For all the things you want to get. For all the ways you want to earn. Across the entire world. In real time. At the incredible speed of now.

The idea for Uber was born on a snowy night in Paris in 2008, and ever since then our DNA of reimagination and reinvention carries on. We’ve grown into a global platform powering flexible earnings and the movement of people and things in ever expanding ways. We’ve gone from connecting rides on 4 wheels to 2 wheels to 18-wheel freight deliveries. From takeout meals to daily essentials to prescription drugs to just about anything you need at any time and earning your way. From drivers with background checks to real-time verification, safety is a top priority every single day. Driven by our purpose – to create mutual understanding through language – we build products that help people connect and communicate across cultures. Through self-study lessons with Babbel,  instructor-led live classes with Babbel Live, Babbel for Business, our own podcast series, and our magazine, our users can focus on using a new language in real situations with real people. And it works: studies with Yale University, City University of New York, and Michigan State University prove that Babbel gets users to speak with confidence. 

The key is a blend of humanity and technology. More than 60,000 lessons in 15 languages are hand-crafted by more than 200 linguists, and user behaviour is constantly analysed to shape and improve the learner experience. 

The Babbel team is as diverse as our content. Based in Berlin, Germany, and New York, USA, 1,000+ Babbelonians from over 80 nationalities represent the diverse backgrounds, characteristics, and perspectives that make each person unique. Building genuine connections with our users is what sets Babbel apart, making it the world's leading language-learning platform with more than 16 million subscriptions sold.

Founded in 2007 as the pioneering online language learning platform, we've grown steadily over the years. In 2023, Babbel was honoured with a place on Fast Company's list of the World's Most Innovative Companies, ranking 4th in the Education category.","industry":["E-Learning Providers"]},"description":"","company":"Babbel","location":"Berlin, Deutschland","position":"Sales Manager B2B","startDate":"01/04/2021","status":""},{"duration":"01/04/2015 - 01/12/2016","company_id":"4132642","endDate":"01/12/2016","companyInformation":{"employee_count":24,"activities":["Entwicklung, Herstellung, Vertrieb hochwertiger Markenprodukte sowie für große Einzelhändler mit ihren Eigenmarken. Wir, die WARIMEX-Unternehmensgruppe, sind ein Familienunternehmen im Herzen Badens mit über 40-jähriger Tradition. Stark verwurzelt mit unserer Heimat vermarkten wir aus Neuried unsere Produkte in bis zu über 90 Ländern. Mit über 100 Mitarbeitern und unseren 3 starken Marken, 𝗖𝗛𝗜𝗔𝗥𝗔 𝗔𝗠𝗕𝗥𝗔®, 𝗦𝗧𝗢𝗡𝗘𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗘® 𝘂𝗻𝗱 𝗔𝗪𝗔𝗩𝗘® bieten wir enorme Vielfältigkeit und Flexibilität

#STONELINE – Die Innovation für gesundes und fettfreies Kochen 
#CHIARA AMBRA – Schönheit und Pflege auf höchstem Niveau 
#AWAVE – Nachhaltige Haushaltsprodukte für eine bessere Zukunft

Unser Erfolg basiert auf stetiger Weiterentwicklung, einem klaren Fokus auf Kundenzufriedenheit und der stetigen Arbeit unseres Teams. Wir glauben an kontinuierliches Wachstum und an die Initiative unserer Mitarbeiter, die das Fundament unseres Erfolgs bilden. Ein hervorragendes Arbeitsklima und spannende Karrieremöglichkeiten machen uns zu einem der attraktivsten Arbeitgeber in der Region.

Currently, more than 180 professionals – patent attorneys, attorneys-at-law, engineers and scientists – work here exclusively in the field of intellectual property. 

We have grown from just one founding member into one of the largest and most renowned law firms in Europe. Its long tradition of excellence is today combined with a truly modern approach to IP consultation. Our commitment to quality and competence is illustrated by the numerous awards and our consistently high ranking in major industry guides.

We offer comprehensive European IP services and competent advice in all technical and legal areas. Its team of more than 130 patent attorneys with European and national qualifications and various technical backgrounds files in excess of 4,000 patent applications each year. We are also the market leader in EPO opposition work, and are highly regarded by our peers for its experience and expertise in this area.

One of our greatest strengths is the interdisciplinary cooperation among our patent attorneys working in the fields of chemistry, biotechnology, mechanical engineering and electrical engineering & IT, as well as our German attorneys-at-law in the areas of trademarks & designs and patent litigation & licensing.

Furthermore, the many IP professionals working at the various HOFFMANN EITLE offices closely cooperate with each other. These include IP specialists from countries such as Germany, the United Kingdom, Italy, France, The Netherlands, USA, Japan, Korea and China. These specialists enable the firm to provide multilingual advice supported by knowledge of various IP systems and the respective legal traditions in their home countries. In addition to this in-house group, HOFFMANN EITLE has a well-established regional and global network of associates.

We have grown from just one founding member into one of the largest and most renowned law firms in Europe. Its long tradition of excellence is today combined with a truly modern approach to IP consultation. Our commitment to quality and competence is illustrated by the numerous awards and our consistently high ranking in major industry guides.

We offer comprehensive European IP services and competent advice in all technical and legal areas. Its team of more than 130 patent attorneys with European and national qualifications and various technical backgrounds files in excess of 4,000 patent applications each year. We are also the market leader in EPO opposition work, and are highly regarded by our peers for its experience and expertise in this area.

Furthermore, the many IP professionals working at the various HOFFMANN EITLE offices closely cooperate with each other. These include IP specialists from countries such as Germany, the United Kingdom, Italy, France, The Netherlands, USA, Japan, Korea and China. These specialists enable the firm to provide multilingual advice supported by knowledge of various IP systems and the respective legal traditions in their home countries. In addition to this in-house group, HOFFMANN EITLE has a well-established regional and global network of associates.

From coding to customer service to couriers, JET is a fun, fast-paced and supportive place where you can be yourself.

Development","solar","startup","tech","software","unicorn","software development","photovoltaics","green energy","clean tech","green tech","career","karriere"],"name":"Enpal","description":"Enpal ist der Marktführer für Solaranlagen in Europa, und der Marktführer für Wärmepumpen sowie größter wettbewerblicher Smart-Meter-Betreiber in Deutschland.

Herzstück unserer Technologie unser Energy Trader mit Künstlicher Intelligenz. Er verbindet Stromspeicher, Ladesäulen und Wärmepumpen mit der Strombörse. Der Energy Trader von Enpal lädt den Speicher und das E-Auto auf, wenn die Preise an der Strombörse besonders niedrig sind. Er verkauft den Strom gewinnbringend ins Stromnetz, wenn die Preise besonders hoch sind. So profitieren die Haushalte doppelt. 

Enpal ist damit führend in der Technologie für virtuelle Kraftwerke und auf dem Weg zum größten virtuellen Kraftwerk in Europa, das schon bald die Leistung eines Atomkraftwerks haben soll.

Enpal ist mehrfacher Testsieger für Solaranlagen und Wärmepumpen. Mit über 80.000 Kundinnen & Kunden in Deutschland und Italien machen wir Energie, wie sie sein soll: einfach, günstig, sauber, und intelligent vernetzt.

Powered by a community of local industry experts, Planday provides a best-in-class digital platform that is easy to use, accurate, secure, and compliant with local needs and standards. From payroll and accounting to POS and reporting, its open API and tech ecosystem is scalable to fit shifting business needs and to build an engaged, flexible workforce.

As you like it.
Real people. Real stories. Real coffee.
Beyond sustainable Innovations.

Caventura steht nicht nur für fair gehandelten Kaffee, sondern geht noch einen Schritt weiter: „beyond sustainable“ bedeutet, dass die Kaffeerösterei ihren Rohkaffee direkt von den Kaffeebauern bezieht und jeden von ihnen persönlich kennt.
Großartigen specialty coffee anzubieten und dabei die größtmögliche Transparenz über die Herkunft des Kaffees zu haben und zu wissen, dass unser Konsum in ein gutes und nachhaltiges Projekt fließt.

Ganz easy für dein Team/Unternehmen mit unseren "coffee as a service"!

Unsere Produkte sind erhältlich bei über 1.200 Bio- und Feinkostläden wie denn’s, Alnatura, Bio Company und Manufactum sowie bei Lifestyle-Hotels, Concept Stores & Co. Mehr über die faszinierende Welt der Pflanzenheilkunde könnt ihr auch bei uns im Laden entdecken und in unserem Online-Magazin auf kruut.de

Present","endDate":"Present","companyInformation":{"employee_count":233,"profile_url":"https://www.linkedin.com/company/esri-deutschland/","activities":["Geoinformationssysteme","ArcGIS","Digitalisierung","Smart Cities","Location Analytics","Operational Intelligence","Kartografie","Datenanalyse","GIS","Geografische Informationssysteme","Web GIS","Location Technology","Apps","Maps","Analyse","Karten","Digital Twin"],"description":"For spatial analysis, planning and decision-making, the geo information solutions based on Esri’s ArcGIS platform are the first choice in the private and public sectors as well as education and science. Adaptable and intuitive with integration options, industry standard ArcGIS can be used on mobile devices, desktops and servers and is highly appreciated by more than one million users worldwide.

As a distributor, Esri Deutschland GmbH, based in Kranzberg near Munich, sells the products of Esri Inc. on an exclusive basis at ten locations in Germany and Switzerland. Present","endDate":"Present","companyInformation":{"employee_count":125,"activities":["ehealth","e-health","SaaS","Healthcare","vaccination management","Telemedizin","KHZG","AI","intersektorale Vernetzung","healthtech"],"name":"samedi GmbH","description":"Vor dem Hintergrund, dass ca. 60% aller Patienten sich im Internet über Gesundheitsthemen informieren, gewinnt die Bereitstellung von entsprechenden Online-Diensten und einer effizienten Koordination zwischen den beteiligten Akteuren bei Gesundheitsfragen zunehmend an Bedeutung.

Die samedi GmbH bietet mit ihrer Web-Software allen Dienstleistern im Gesundheitswesen eine fachübergreifende, webbasierte Vernetzung auf Basis einer gemeinsamen Prozessplanung und Patientenkoordination mit höchsten Sicherheitsanforderungen. Arztpraxen, Kliniken und medizinische Dienstleister können über die Web-Software samedi gemeinsam ihre Arbeitsabläufe und Ressourcenplanung steuern und durch die verbesserte Koordination eine optimale Auslastung erzielen. Basierend auf der Plattform-Architektur können standortübergreifend Behandlungen koordiniert, online Überweisungen getätigt und Informationen sicher ausgetauscht sowie auch dem Patienten Online-Termine (ohne die übliche Telefonschleife) angeboten werden. Durch das integrierte Benachrichtigungssystem können Patienten automatisch per SMS an Termine erinnert und über Terminverschiebungen informiert werden sowie zusätzliche Informationen per E-Mail erhalten, wie z.B. Anamnesebögen bei Erstterminen, Aufklärungsbögen oder Anfahrtsskizzen.
Patienten können sich kostenlos ein Benutzerkonto anlegen und Ärzte haben die Möglichkeit die Software unverbindlich einen Monat lang kostenfrei zu testen.

Unser Hauptziel besteht darin, Unternehmen dabei zu unterstützen, ihre IT-Kosten zu reduzieren und gleichzeitig qualitativ hochwertige Hardware in flexiblen Stückzahlen in Rekordzeit - oft in weniger als 3 Werktagen - bereitzustellen.

Unsere innovative Plattform, das kostenlose Hardware-Cockpit, ermöglicht es Ihnen, Ihre Geräte über deren gesamten Lebenszyklus hinweg mühelos zu verwalten. Zudem sorgt unser End-of-Life-Service dafür, dass Geräte verantwortungsvoll und umweltfreundlich ausgesondert werden.

Bei circulee geht es jedoch nicht nur um effizientes Hardware-Management; wir verfolgen auch ambitionierte Nachhaltigkeitsziele. Wir sind fest davon überzeugt, dass Unternehmen ihre IT-Hardware effizient und kosteneffektiv verwalten können, ohne dabei ihre Verpflichtungen im Hinblick auf Umweltverträglichkeit aus den Augen zu verlieren.

Gemeinsam mit Ihnen setzen wir den Weg zur "grünen IT" fort und tragen dazu bei, dass Ihre IT-Infrastruktur nicht nur kosteneffizient, sondern auch umweltfreundlich und nachhaltig ist.","logo":"https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4E0BAQFvaNAsFjJ8Nw/company-logo_200_200/company-logo_200_200/0/1724950493786?e=1747872000&v=beta&t=iO96gXRyUBPnZfQs6-UJ9VtTlO0rn2fAmP12732lsDs","industry":["Information Technology & Services"],"id":"79399116"},"description":"","company":"circulee","location":"Berlin, Deutschland · On-site","position":"Sales Manager","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/03/2024"},{"duration":"01/10/2023 - 01/02/2024","endDate":"01/02/2024","companyInformation":{},"description":"","company":"Delta Car Trade SA","location":"Berlin, Deutschland · On-site","position":"Sales Account Manager","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/10/2023"},{"duration":"01/07/2021 - 01/10/2023","endDate":"01/10/2023","companyInformation":{},"description":"","company":"Knaack GmbH","location":"Schorfheide, Brandenburg, Deutschland","position":"Zertifizierter Automobilverkäufer SKODA","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/07/2021"},{"duration":"01/06/2018 - 01/07/2021","endDate":"01/07/2021","companyInformation":{},"description":"","company":"Knaack GmbH","location":"Schorfheide, Brandenburg, Deutschland","position":"Automobilkaufmann","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/06/2018"}],"location":"Berlin, Berlin, Germany","certifications":[{"organization":"Google","name":"Grundlagen des Onlinemarketings"},{"organization":"ŠKODA Financial Services Sverige","name":"Zertifizierter Berater für Finanzprodukte"}],"headline":"Sales Manager @circulee | circulee.com | Green IT, einfach besser als neu!","languageSkills":{}}

So schaffen wir individuelle und nachhaltige Lösungen, die persönliche Entwicklung und unternehmerischen Erfolg gleichermaßen fördern.

Seit 1978 verfolgen wir ein klares Ziel: Die Entwicklung von Menschen und Organisationen zu erleichtern und durch zukunftsweisende Lernlösungen nachhaltigen Erfolg zu ermöglichen. Mit höchsten Qualitätsstandards und einem klaren Fokus auf die Lernenden setzen wir neue Maßstäbe für die Zukunft des Lernens.

Das sind wir, die Haufe Akademie, Teil der Haufe Group.

Die Haufe Group ist ein führender B2B-Anbieter für integrierte Unternehmens- und Arbeitsplatzlösungen. Das Familienunternehmen unterstützt Menschen und Unternehmen in ihrer unternehmerischen Entwicklung und bei der erfolgreichen Gestaltung von Transformationsprozessen. Mit Content, Software und Weiterbildungen.

Present","endDate":"Present","companyInformation":{"employee_count":928,"profile_url":"https://www.linkedin.com/company/creatioglobal/","activities":["Customer Relationship Management","CRM","BPM","Business Process Management","Marketing","SaaS","Cloud","Software","Sales","Global","Innovation","Process Improvement","Metrics","Operational Excellence","Accelerate","Growth","ERP","Services","ITIL","Agile","Automation","Project Management","Strategy","Business Development","Lean Six Sigma","Integration","Partnerships","Communication","Customer Experience","Reports","Data Analytics","Modeling"],"description":"Creatio is a global vendor of an AI-native platform to automate CRM and workflows with no-code. Millions of workflows are launched on our platform daily in 100 countries by thousands of clients. Genuine care for our clients and partners is a defining part of Creatio DNA. 

Creatio offerings include a no-code platform (Studio Creatio), CRM applications (marketing, sales, and service), industry workflows for 20 verticals and marketplace add-ons. We help our customers digitize workflows, enhance customer and employee experiences, and boost the efficiency of commercial and operational teams. 

Creatio is recognized as a Leader and Strong Performer in multiple Gartner and Forrester reports. Creatio products receive raving end-user reviews on peer-to-peer portals.  

Our customers enjoy the freedom to own their automation. Freedom is provided through unlimited customization, the ability to build apps without a line of code, and a universe of ready-to-use templates and connectors. Our platform empowers knowledge workers to build applications with no-code while increasing organizational capacity.

We believe in genuine care. We build sincere relationships with our clients and partners by giving a hand first and then thinking about business, communicating transparently and openly, and listening, adjusting and bringing value.  

Creatio is an American company headquartered in Boston, MA. We have 700+ employees in six offices and a local presence in 25 countries. On average, our customers achieve a +10% profit uplift using our leading Retail AI.

Our solution uses advanced machine learning models to forecast demand for different price points and marketing options with high accuracy. We offer the most intuitive way to make decisions based on targets, not rules. 
 
Why? 
After starting his career as a pricing consultant at A.T. Kearney, 7Learnings co-founder Felix Hoffman was in charge of Zalando’s global pricing algorithm. There, he gained first-hand expertise in the power of machine learning technology for pricing. With this experience as its foundation, the 7Learnings team has developed a next-generation pricing software built on the most advanced machine learning technology.

We believe in personal growth through curiosity and continuous learning. At 7Learnings we create an environment where constant learning is encouraged. We create a winning team by teaching and helping each other to gain new skills. We believe learning does not happen automatically: You have to put in the work to keep on growing.

We believe in a culture based on transparency and honesty. We call it what it is and don’t beat around the bush. We offer candor feedback to our colleagues and don’t gossip behind their backs. We are honest about our mistakes and face the facts. 

We own it. We are not victims but actively shape the way we work. We take pride in our work and aspire to achieve the best results possible. We do not lose sight of deadlines and balance quality and timely delivery. 

With that said, if you identify with these values and find yourself a great addition to the team, take a look at our career page to become a 7Learner.

Although TeamViewer is free of charge for private use, it has around 640,000 subscribers and enables companies of all sizes and from all industries to digitalize their business-critical processes through seamless connectivity. Against the backdrop of global megatrends like device proliferation, automation and new work, TeamViewer proactively shapes digital transformation and continuously innovates in the fields of Augmented Reality, Internet of Things and Artificial Intelligence. Since the company’s foundation in 2005, TeamViewer’s software has been installed on more than 2.5 billion devices around the world. The company is headquartered in Goppingen, Germany, and employs more than 1,500 people globally. In 2023, TeamViewer achieved a revenue of around EUR 627 million. With our software we want to make the crafting industry digital, easier and more effective. 

Headquartered in Berlin, ToolTime developed a modern and easy-to-use software for these businesses to free tradesmen and -women from tiring tasks and to save valuable time while catering to their particular needs and wants.

Welcome to HOOGEN Experience GmbH - your expert for barrier-free and future oriented elevator solutions. Our goal is to create an independent and livable environment through innovative technologies and sustainable solutions. ","industry":["Machinery"],"id":"101648648"},"description":"At HOOGEN Experience GmbH, I am proud to be part of a team that reimagines the traditional elevator as a central infrastructure hub, addressing a significant societal challenge. We integrate state-of-the-art technologies to connect elevators with key stakeholders through IoT, ICT, and intelligent interfaces.

A crucial area we focus on is the future of digital home healthcare and relieving the burden on caregivers through intelligent elevator systems. In the face of a growing shortage of skilled healthcare workers and the increasing number of elderly individuals forced to move out of their homes due to the lack of fully accessible traditional elevator systems, our innovative solution provides a critical answer.

Our elevator system not only enhances accessibility but also increases property value, making it financially attractive for everyone. By considering health aspects and opening doors for subsidies and grants, we provide a holistic solution that supports aging in place.

In my role, I am focused on the challenge of enabling individuals to live independently in their familiar surroundings in an age-appropriate manner. My responsibilities include forging partnerships with construction companies, architects and social organizations to expand the availability of accessible housing. I am committed to elevating awareness about sustainable, age-appropriate properties and actively advocating for policies that promote barrier-free access.

I am on the lookout for like-minded individuals who are eager to join me in tackling this challenge and working towards a more inclusive society. Combine this with healthy financial results and the possibilities are unlimited. We live in a multicultural, high-energy environment where we encourage people to take the lead and step out of the ordinary. We don’t talk the talk. We walk the walk.

Because we re-invent fashion for a better world…

You can become a dolphin or a shark and explore the ocean using your mobile device, computer, or ideally, a virtual reality headset.  

The project started its journey at the Biennale College Cinema VR 2019 and was later selected for the Cannes Film Festival XR Development Showcase. “How is the Water” is now in its last days on Kickstarter ( https://howisthewater.kckb.st/ba39a25c ), where it has already raised over 60 000 USD from more than 500 backers worldwide. 

The project aims to connect people with the ocean, combining entertainment, experiential learning, and real-world marine conservation scenarios thanks to partnerships with many marine organizations like Whale & Dolphin Conservation, Reef Life Foundation, and Ocean Sounds. Jakob, Bastian, Patrick and Artur founded orderbird GmbH in 2011 which is now one of Europe’s leading cloud POS system providers with more than 130 Birds in our nest.

Present","endDate":"Present","companyInformation":{"profile_url":"https://www.linkedin.com/company/parcel-perform/","description":"Parcel Perform is the next-generation E-Commerce Data & Delivery Experience Platform that pushes beyond traditional post-purchase boundaries. Nect offers fully automated online identification and digital signature via the Nect Wallet app, based on the in-house developed and patented Nect technology. 
The Hamburg-based IT company aims to become Germany's most widely used ID wallet, providing an "all-in-one" solution for everyday use.

Nect Wallet, Nect's digital identity app, makes it possible to reuse verified identities. Using Nect technology, based on artificial intelligence, an ID document and a selfie video are taken to identify a person to create the digital ID for Nect Wallet. In the future, users will be able to store everyday IDs such as driver's license, health insurance card, ID card and other documents in the Nect Wallet in a simple and easy way. 

Founded in 2017 by Benny Bennet Jürgens and Carlo Ulbrich, five years later the company is a team of over 150 Nectees, consisting of more than 18 nationalities and active in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Poland and Spain. 

With 4.9 out of 5.0 stars in the App Store, the Nect Wallet is the best rated identity verification app. Do you want to become part of our story? Let's con•nect!

From coding to customer service to couriers, JET is a fun, fast-paced and supportive place where you can be yourself.

No day is the same. Our days are filled with new experiences. We see every challenge that comes our way as a chance to grow, both the business, and ourselves.

So load up your plate with ideas that get you excited, because at JET everything is on the table.

Founded in Montréal, Canada in 2005, Lightspeed is dual-listed on the New York Stock Exchange and Toronto Stock Exchange (NYSE: LSPD) (TSX: LSPD). With teams across North America, Europe and Asia Pacific, the company serves retail, hospitality and golf businesses in over 100 countries.

...

En propulsant les entreprises qui constituent la base de l'économie mondiale, la plateforme de commerce unique de Lightspeed aide les commerçants à innover pour simplifier, faire évoluer et offrir des expériences client exceptionnelles.

Fondée à Montréal, au Canada, en 2005, Lightspeed est doublement cotée à la Bourse de New York et à la Bourse de Toronto (NYSE : LSPD) (TSX : LSPD). Avec des équipes réparties en Amérique du Nord, en Europe et en Asie-Pacifique, l'entreprise est au service des entreprises de vente au détail, d'hôtellerie et de golf dans plus de 100 pays.

Auf diese Weise können sie sich auch an sehr großen Projekten beteiligen, zu denen üblicherweise nur institutionelle Investoren Zugang haben. 

Für Anleger:

Bei Engel & Völkers Digital Invest profitieren Anleger von der Sicherheit, dass jedes Projekt von uns während des gesamten Finanzierungszeitraums begleitet wird und vorab mit unserer umfassenden Immobilien-Expertise analysiert worden ist – auf Basis unabhängiger Gutachten und mit einem so tief gehenden Prozess, wie ihn institutionelle Investoren verlangen. 

Für Projektentwickler

Als idealer Projektfinanzierungs-Partner bietet Engel & Völkers Digital Invest Finanzierungslösungen für jede Projektphase sowie Zugang zum weltweiten Partnernetzwerk – sofern gewünscht. Unsere Finanzierungsgarantie bietet sofortige Planungssicherheit und eine Projektpräsentation im exklusiven Umfeld von Engel & Völkers, die sich als Referenz nutzen lässt und neue Zielgruppen erschließt.

Das sichere, stabile & hochperformante Firmennetzwerk für alle Ihre Standorte dank SD-WAN, SASE und Managed Services.

Wie können Sie das Firmennetzwerk für alle Ihre Standorte zu einer sicheren, stabilen, redundanten und hochperformanten Basis für Ihre Cloud-Strategie machen?

Und das ohne Unsummen oder die wertvolle Zeit Ihrer IT-Abteilung in Ihre digitale Infrastruktur investieren zu müssen?

Indem Sie sich moderne Software-Konzepte wie SD-WAN (Software Defined WAN) und SASE (Secure Access Service Edge) für Ihre digitale Infrastruktur zunutze machen. 

Diese übernehmen administrative Aufgaben für Sie, schützen Ihr Netzwerk jederzeit und überall zuverlässig vor Cyberattacken und passen seine Performance automatisch an Ihren Bedarf an - zum Festpreis.

Wir konzipieren, implementieren, migrieren und managen Ihr modernes Firmennetzwerk für Sie, während Sie sich sicher und entspannt auf Ihr Kerngeschäft konzentrieren.

Sie möchten wissen, wie das Sie und Ihr Unternehmen funktionieren könnte?

In Echtzeit können die verschiedenen Planungsteams ein Meeting am 3D-Modell abhalten und Einzelheiten direkt an den jeweiligen Baukomponenten besprechen. Dabei werden die Fachmodelle aller Gewerke zu einem digitalen Zwilling des aktuellen Planungsstandes CAD-unabhängig zusammengeführt (Digital Asset Model), sodass alle Bauplanungsinformationen strukturiert und zentral integriert sind. Darüber hinaus stellt Visoplan eine Datenhistorie zur Verfügung, mithilfe der sämtliche Änderungen und Probleme am 3D-Modell im Zeitverlauf betrachtet werden können. Auf diese Weise lassen sich alle Daten nachverfolgen, dokumentieren sowie archivieren und Visoplan wird zur zentralen Schnittstelle zwischen den einzelnen CAD-Systemen. We're not just a business phone system; we're a unified and reliable communications powerhouse. Aircall seamlessly integrates voice, SMS, WhatsApp, and social media channels into a single platform, with bi-directional syncing across 100+ essential business apps. Imagine your CRM and Helpdesk data flowing effortlessly into every customer interaction, empowering your team to deliver smarter, more personalized experiences.

Trusted by over 20,000 businesses globally, Aircall's AI-powered platform supercharges sales and support. We automate the busywork—optimizing call routing, automating repetitive tasks–while simultaneously delivering actionable insights from across every customer interaction. While searching for the appropriate physician, patients benefit from more than 2.5 million reviews, useful filter functions and a database of more than 250,000 medical professionals across Germany. 

As soon as the appropriate physician is found, patients can either pay a visit to the physician's practice onsite or attend an appointment via online video consultation. In addition, jameda provides an online video communication solution with its product patientus for medical institutions, clinics, health insurance companies and medical care centers.


Through the perspective of a physician, jameda offers an all-in-one solution for the digital patient contact: a cloud-based calendar with an online appointment functionality and online video consultations. Furthermore, physicians have the opportunity to present their medical practice and to provide comprehensive information about their range of services on jameda.de.

Wo zu Beginn Solaranlagen verkauft wurden, werden heute intelligente und smart vernetzte Ganzjahresenergiesystem mit Zukunft in und auf den Häusern der Kunden installiert. Von der Solaranlage auf dem Dach bis zum Stromspeicher im Keller. Modular erweiterbar für jeden Bedarf - perfekt und individuell abgestimmt. Smart und zukunftssicher. Wir haben die Jobflow-App gemeinsam mit über 100 Schüler:innen entwickelt und damit die benutzerfreundlichste App für Schüler:innen auf Ausbildungssuche gebaut. Doch bevor es mit der Ausbildungssuche losgeht, steht vor allem die berufliche Orientierung im Fokus. Denn wir wissen, dass 81 %* der Schüler:innen Schwierigkeiten haben, sich beruflich zu orientieren. Deshalb sorgt unser KI-gestützter Ausbildungsberater dafür, dass Schüler:innen genau den Ausbildungsplatz finden, der zu ihren individuellen Stärken und Interessen passt.

Zudem haben wir über 500 Kurzvideos produziert, in denen ehemalige Azubis und Influencer:innen, die die jeweilige Ausbildung selbst gemacht haben, realistische Einblicke in den Ausbildungsalltag geben. Darüber hinaus erstellen wir auch Videos im TikTok-Style für unsere Kunden und haben als Marktführer in diesem Bereich bereits in vielen Branchen – von Großkonzernen bis zum Mittelstand –  Erfolge feiern können.

Um auch die Unternehmensperspektive einzubeziehen, haben wir 30 Personaler in unsere Produktentwicklung integriert. So haben wir einen Prozess zur Vorqualifizierung von Bewerber:innen entwickelt, der garantiert, dass nur passende Talente die Stelle erreichen. Das spart den Unternehmen nicht nur Zeit, sondern auch den Aufwand, Absagen an ungeeignete Kandidat:innen zu verschicken. Und vor allem wird sichergestellt, dass Ausbildungsstellen vollständig und kosteneffizient besetzt werden. Ein weiteres Highlight für unsere Kunden: Unsere Bewerbergarantie mit einer Mindestanzahl an Bewerbungen und die Garantie, dass schulische sowie sprachliche Anforderungen immer erfüllt sind.

Falls dich Jobflow interessiert und du gerne mit uns zusammenarbeiten möchtest, freuen wir uns, wenn du einen kostenlosen Beratungstermin mit uns vereinbarst!

NeoTaste is also a free marketing platform for restaurateurs, where customers can find the best deals at the coolest restaurants in town. The biggest added value for restaurateurs is that they don't have to offer the deals at any time of the day, but can set them individually adjusted to the usual occupancy.
So if the restaurant is completely full on a saturday evening, which is usually the case, NeoTaste users don't even have the option of booking a deal for that period and choose a time when experience shows that fewer guests are welcomed. NeoTaste users have a culinary overview of their city, as well as many cool deals, such as 2for1 main course, a free appetizer and much more!

But that's just the beginning. Through self-study lessons with Babbel,  instructor-led live classes with Babbel Live, Babbel for Business, our own podcast series, and our magazine, our users can focus on using a new language in real situations with real people. And it works: studies with Yale University, City University of New York, and Michigan State University prove that Babbel gets users to speak with confidence. 

The key is a blend of humanity and technology. More than 60,000 lessons in 15 languages are hand-crafted by more than 200 linguists, and user behaviour is constantly analysed to shape and improve the learner experience. 

The Babbel team is as diverse as our content. Based in Berlin, Germany, and New York, USA, 1,000+ Babbelonians from over 80 nationalities represent the diverse backgrounds, characteristics, and perspectives that make each person unique. Building genuine connections with our users is what sets Babbel apart, making it the world's leading language-learning platform with more than 16 million subscriptions sold.

Founded in 2007 as the pioneering online language learning platform, we've grown steadily over the years. The company, established in 1997, has offices in Hamburg, Munich, Berlin, Frankfurt, Stuttgart, Cologne, Leipzig, New York, Singapore and Manila and now employs about 250 highly qualified employees. 
As a system integrator, avodaq stands for quality and reliability as well as for superior expertise: We successfully implement projects where others have long surrendered.
And there is also our passion for technology — as well as our sharp acumen. From the wide range of products in the IT market, we develop that one solution, which guarantees the greatest possible success, with certified quality. 


Products and Services
Our portfolio is very comprehensive and includes networks, collaboration, data centers, cloud solutions, management systems, security and Internet of Things. avodaq provides the entire performance spectrum that you would expect from a leading system integrator. In other words, we take on the preparatory consulting and analyzing, we plan, design, and install. Also, we provide a highly qualified service, a quick exchange of devices in the event of a fault, and we operate and supply both hardware and software.
But avodaq has a lot more to offer besides the typical services you will find in most system integrators. It is important to us that our clients'​ employees can work easily with the new systems and know how to manage them in the workplace. As a Junior Marketing Manager, my task was to execute the strategy to increase brand visibility in Benelux & Nordics. I focussed on five different tactics: SEO, tradeshows, content distribution, webinars, and PR. For SEO, I did the research on the keywords that fit our purposes most successfully. To create content, I coordinated between different multimedia teams. As we were a young company, we lacked an audience in Benelux & Nordics. To counter this issue for webinars, my strategy was to hijack audiences of third parties like influencers, external platforms, and specialized media.

What sets us apart: 

Empion is the first automated headhunting system for the skilled labor market. Applicants and companies are matched through a AI-based Robo Advisor based on skills, values, and personality traits. 

In a research-based employer analysis, the Robo Advisor quantifies corporate values and seeks potential candidates accordingly. Talents discover their ideal corporate culture type through Empion. After evaluating the analysis, Empion presents them with suitable job offers. 

Our vision: 

We aim to bring individuality to recruiting, providing both companies and applicants with a personalized experience in talent and job searches. We don't see ourselves merely as traditional recruiters but as dedicated strategic talent consultants. 

Our approach is characterized by personal attention, tailored actions, and a commitment to our talents that goes beyond the ordinary.

Founded in Berlin, Germany in 2013, we offer online language courses in German, English, Business English, French, Spanish and Italian to more than 100,000 students worldwide.

Our private and small group classes are taught by 1,500+ qualified, native-level teachers from around the world, leading more than 550,000 classes per year. Our lessons are offered 24/7, empowering even the busiest people to master a language and unlock their potential, at any time from anywhere.

We believe in a communicative approach to language learning that allows students to put their new language skills into practice immediately. Our CEFR-aligned learning materials are designed by linguistic experts and focus on meaningful topics that relate to our students’ interests, careers and everyday lives. Thanks to our extensive rotating roster of teachers and our small group classes, students are exposed to a variety of regional accents and expressions within the same language and have the time and space to practice speaking in every lesson.

Our diverse team includes over 250 international professionals, representing dozens of countries and languages. In 2021, Lingoda won the EdTech Cool Tool Award for the Best Language Learning Solution; the Europas Awards also named Lingoda as 2021’s Hottest EdTech StartUp. We have a score of 4.4 on Trustpilot and 74% of our reviews rated as ‘excellent’ because we offer a high-quality and authentic learning experience that helps students achieve their learning goals and speak a new language with confidence. 

Lingoda GmbH
Zimmerstr. 69
10117 Berlin, Germany
